titles.title: Defense Maintenance Data Transparency Act
Defense Maintenance Data Transparency Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Defense to develop guidelines and resources on the acquisition or licensing of intellectual property, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Defense Maintenance Data Transparency Act
This bill requires the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sustainment within the Department of Defense to develop guidelines and resources on the acquisition or licensing of intellectual property.
